datoCmsEvent.title: Monthly Workshop Series:  Casting Q&A with Kate Lumpkin

children.value: Join Casting Director, Kate Lumpkin, for an hour long, live Q&A session where you can ask all of the industry questions you have been wanting to ask in a safe and productive space.

Kate Lumpkin is the Founder of and Lead Casting Director at Kate Lumpkin Casting, CSA. Collectively, as a casting professional, she has worked on over 40 TV/Film productions and 80 theatrical productions in New York City and across the USA including shows at The Kennedy Center, The Actors Theatre of Louisville, The A.R.T, and many others. Kate teaches workshops in New York and at numerous Colleges and Universities, is a private coach to clients all around the world, and is the Head of Education for The Broadway Collective.
